title: IBGE API
description: This API provides comprehensive data on states, cities, and even districts across Brazil, making it an ideal resource for populating databases and creating dynamic datalists.

title: VIACEP API
description: The VIACEP API is a valuable tool for developers seeking address information in Brazil. By simply providing a CEP (Postal Code), developers can easily retrieve detailed address data, making it perfect for enhancing form functionality.

title: Sheet JS
description: Sheet JS is a powerful library designed to extract data from spreadsheets. With its capabilities, importing spreadsheet information into databases becomes seamless, streamlining data management processes.

title: Cookie Management
description: This script provides functionality for creating, retrieving, and deleting cookies on a webpage. It allows users to save cookies with custom values, search for a specific cookie by name, list all stored cookies, and delete individual or all cookies.

title: Form to JSON
description: This script has the functionality of filling a form and downloading the content of the form as a JSON file
